insecureSkipTLSVerify.description: Indicates whether to skip TLS verification when cloning the repository. Default is false.

provider.description: The name of the Git provider to use. Currently 'azure', 'bitbucket', 'gitea', 'github', and 'gitlab' are supported. Kargo will try to infer the provider if it is not explicitly specified.

prNumber.description: The number of the pull request to wait for.

repoURL.description: The URL of a remote Git repository to clone.
